UB20.

Café Bar

Home Read >>

Welcome to UB20.

Founded in April 2017 by two young man from Yogyakarta, UB20 comes from an idea that everyone can enjoy coffee. It’s all started at a small rented building on Jalan Kaliurang. By 2019, UB20 has 5 branches, one of them located in Jakarta.
